## EV and RL correlations 


```{r ev_rl_correlations_setup, include=FALSE}
source("stanlba/lba_rl_joint_setup.R")
source("stanlba/singlelevelmodel/single_level_model_summarize_fast.R")
source("stanlba/singlelevelmodel/lba_rl_joint_v2_evaluate_functions.R")
source("stanlba/singlelevelmodel/lba_rl_joint_v1_functions.R")
source("stanlba/singlelevelmodel/lba_rl_joint_v7_functions.R")
source("stanlba/singlelevelmodel/lba_rl_joint_v10_functions.R")

regions<-get_dmn_regions()
#what we really wanna do is extract the sigmas
Sigma_dims<-25
rpe_covarvec<-paste0("Sigma[",1:Sigma_dims[1],",",1,"]")
rpe_covarvec_df<-paste0("Sigma.",1:Sigma_dims[1],".",1,".")
library(rstan)

lba_rl_version<-"joint_20180917_1"

lba_rl_version<-"rl_joint_20180723_1"

DeltaThetaLabels=paste0("con_",get_dmn_regions())

```


### For an RL+LBA Model

```{r ev_rl_lba_correlations_setup, include=FALSE}

# model_lba_rl_joint_v13_old<-single_level_model_summarize_fast(
#   single_run_dir=paste0(localsettings$data.dir,"lba_rl"),
#   model_version="joint_20180723_1",
#   model_filename="lba_rl_single_exp_joint_v13",
#   model_subversion="",avoid_saving = TRUE)

model_lba_rl_joint_v13<-single_level_model_summarize_fast(
  single_run_dir=paste0(localsettings$data.dir,"lba_rl"),
  model_version="joint_20180927_1",
  model_filename="lba_rl_single_exp_joint_v13",
  model_subversion="")

```


```{r ev_rl_lba_correlations_neuralmerge, include=FALSE}
source("stanlba/singlelevelmodel/empirical_correlations_estimate.R")
neural_trial_data<-merge_with_neural_data(model_lba_rl_joint_v13$results_summary_dt)

subj_sample<-unique(neural_trial_data$sid)
subj_sample10<-subj_sample[round(seq(from=1,to=length(subj_sample),length.out=10),0)]
subj_sample5<-subj_sample[round(seq(from=1,to=length(subj_sample),length.out=5),0)]
```

```{r ev_rl_lba_correlations_display, echo=FALSE, fig.width=6,fig.height=6}


ggplot(neural_trial_data[sid %in%subj_sample5],
       aes(trial_expected_val,con_ROI_Left.Accumbens.area,color=as.factor(presentation_n)))+geom_point()+
  facet_grid(sid~interaction(rid,motivation),scales = "free")+
  labs(title="EV by L Accumbens Activity for each run", x="EV",color="Presentation Number")+
  theme(legend.position="bottom")


ggplot(neural_trial_data[sid %in%subj_sample5],
       aes(run_pred_err_c2,con_ROI_Left.Accumbens.area,color=as.factor(presentation_n)))+geom_point()+
  facet_grid(sid~interaction(rid,motivation),scales = "free")+
  labs(title="RPE by L Accumbens Activity for each run", x="RPE",color="Presentation Number")+
  theme(legend.position="bottom")

```

```{r ev_rl_lba_correlations_display_abs, echo=FALSE, fig.width=6,fig.height=6}

ggplot(neural_trial_data[sid %in%subj_sample5],
       aes(run_pred_err_c2_abs,con_ROI_Left.Accumbens.area,color=as.factor(presentation_n)))+geom_point()+
  facet_grid(sid~interaction(rid,motivation),scales = "free")+
  labs(title="L Accumbens Activity by Abs(RPE) for each run", x="RPE",color="Presentation Number")+
  theme(legend.position="bottom")

ggplot(neural_trial_data[sid %in%subj_sample5],
  aes(run_pred_err_c2_abs,con_ROI_Right.Accumbens.area,color=as.factor(presentation_n)))+geom_point()+
  facet_grid(sid~interaction(rid,motivation),scales = "free")+
  labs(title="R Accumbens Activity by Abs(RPE) for each run", x="RPE",color="Presentation Number")+
  theme(legend.position="bottom")

```

#simple RL model

```{r ev_rl_correlations_setup2, echo=FALSE, fig.width=6,fig.height=6}

model_rl_joint_v9<-single_level_model_summarize_fast(
  single_run_dir=paste0(localsettings$data.dir,"lba_rl"),
  model_version="rl_joint_20180927_1",
  model_filename="rl_single_exp_joint_v9",
  model_subversion="")

```

```{r ev_rl_lba_correlations_neuralmerge2, include=FALSE}


neural_trial_data<-merge_with_neural_data(model_rl_joint_v9$results_summary_dt)
subj_sample<-unique(neural_trial_data$sid)
subj_sample5<-subj_sample[round(seq(from=1,to=length(subj_sample),length.out=5),0)]
```

## EV


```{r rl_lba_correlations_display_ev, echo=FALSE, fig.width=6,fig.height=6}

ggplot(neural_trial_data[sid %in%subj_sample5],
       aes(trial_expected_val,con_ROI_Left.Accumbens.area,color=as.factor(presentation_n)))+geom_point()+
  facet_grid(sid~interaction(rid,motivation),scales = "free")+
  labs(title="L Accumbens Activity by EV for each run", x="EV",color="Presentation Number")+
  theme(legend.position="bottom")
```




```{r rl_lba_correlations_display_ev_rpe, echo=FALSE, fig.width=6,fig.height=6}

ggplot(neural_trial_data[sid %in%subj_sample5],
       aes(trial_expected_val,run_pred_err_c2,color=as.factor(presentation_n)))+geom_point()+
  facet_grid(sid~interaction(rid,motivation),scales = "free")+
  labs(title="RPE by EV for each run", x="EV",color="Presentation Number")+
  theme(legend.position="bottom")
```
## RPE

